name: Hello Ghosts!
description:
Inspired by the Night Parade of One Hundred Demons (Hyakki Yakō) in Japan, this piece depicts a celebration of conquering fear and nightmare. I know how scary the world can be, but do this...take a deep breath and be friend with them. Don't fight back and appreciate them instead. Do something what you fear the most and they will no longer defeat you.  

A submission to Gengoya Club and Monday Art Club tribute competition
